original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1042)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(756)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並召喚 <color=#ccffcc>17</color> 隻<color=#4cc769>錦帆渠師</color>加入我軍。<color=#4cc769>錦帆渠師</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1206)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1206)@</color>
